How do I make an appointment?: How do I make an appointment?
You can make an appointment by clicking: You can make an appointment by clicking on the Doctors image in the Doctor section.
Do I need to create an account to book a: Do I need to create an account to book an appointment?
Yes, to streamline the booking process a: Yes, to streamline the booking process and provide better services, we recommend creating an account. You can register with your email address.
Can I reschedule or cancel my appointmen: Can I reschedule or cancel my appointment?
Yes, you can reschedule or cancel your a: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel your appointment with at least 24 hours' notice.
What types of specialists are available: What types of specialists are available on your platform?
We offer a wide range of medical special: We offer a wide range of medical specialists including cardiologists, dermatologists, pediatricians, orthopedists, neurologists, and more. You can browse the specialists and find the one that best suits your needs.
Yes, we offer telehealth consultations f: Yes, we offer telehealth consultations for some services. Contact us for more information.
What should I do if I miss my appointmen: What should I do if I miss my appointment?
If you miss an appointment, we encourage: If you miss an appointment, we encourage you to reschedule it as soon as possible. You can contact our support team for assistance in rescheduling or finding another available time slot.
We are a healthcare platform committed t: We are a healthcare platform committed to providing affordable and accessible medical services. Our goal is to connect patients with trusted doctors and healthcare providers to offer high-quality care.
